titleStmt.title: A proclamation, anent the rebels who have not yet taken the bond
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
List of those appointed to take bond from the rebels, printed in two columns, follows text.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the seventh day of October, one thousand six hundred and eighty, and of Our Reign, the two and thirtieth year.
Signed: Al. Gibson, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
